website_summaries.verdict: Simple design that gives you a solid level of performance.
pros: Good audio quality for both those in the room and those on the phone line
3 microphones are built into the base unit with a 10-foot pickup range
Noise reduction and volume control built into the conference phone for better voice clarity
Allows for simultaneous 2-way communication in a natural manner
cons: Price is a little high considering some of the features missing

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound simple use with existing phone line
customer_reviews.text: Have utlized these conference phones within our different meeting rooms over the years. Convenient to move around and setup anywhere there is a phone line. Great price compared to alternative models with similar features.
customer_reviews.author: damian marone

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the SoundStation2 with EX Mic Pods to replace an old Polycom in our 12' X 24' conference room. The sound is just excellent and with the Mic Pods at the ends of our large conference table, even call participants sitting in the corners of the room can now be heard. No more moving the triangle from one end of the table to the other. Setup was as simple as plugging everything in and dialing. The Mic Pods have their own mute buttons. Can't think of anything negative to say.
customer_reviews.author: tenmileblues

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  Quality is great too.
customer_reviews.text: The wi-fi enabled device works well and will enable dongles in the future as our company grows. This phone has been used in the last 4 places I worked and it is probably the gold standard for the market of Expandable Conference Room phones.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G. Mohr

customer_reviews.title: This one works great. Sounds better on speaker than most handheld telephones ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked forever for a conference phone that worked on an analog line. This one works great. Sounds better on speaker than most handheld telephones do.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E Beaty

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace one that was given to us. We do conference calls about once a week and we can hear the speaker from anywhere in the room and the people on the other end have no trouble hearing us either. We currently do not use the extra speakers that you could use with this unit. Great Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mohawk Valley Economic Development District, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Great for conference rooms
customer_reviews.text: This was for our startup's conference room and it lasted AGES. It's exactly what you need (you may need those little polycom mic pods depending on how big the room/table is, but the speakerphone on this is pretty powerful). Sound quality is good, the keys are easy to press (although they did get a bit 'soft' after several years). Good value if you don't have the money to invest in super super high end A/V equipment.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back same day as no one could have understand me - east of time even if it was free you still wouldn’t use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up with fantastic sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for work because we have a lot of conference calls for our office and it became a real hassle to try to borrow the department phone (which was just a regular phone). This was definitely a very worthy purchase. The sound quality is pretty amazing and the phone is very easy to set up. Buy the microphone extensions if you need to use this in a large conference room because although sound quality is good, obviously if the room gets too big, some people won't be heard as well. My only regret is that we didn't buy it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Watanabe

customer_reviews.title: Great voice quality
customer_reviews.text: This speaker phone is definitely high-grade, and thus the higher price, but it works quite well for my home office. I use this phone at least 3-4 hours a day and it has done quite well. Speaker quality is excellent and I have received no complaints about my voice quality. The full duplex capability of the phone works quite well too.
customer_reviews.author: JimConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Best Analog Speakerphone...
customer_reviews.text: Polycom quality... it's a great thing. This is the expandable model which means you can plug in two extra microphone pucks for reall long conference room tables. I run three of these units at work and the sound quality is excellent. This is an "analog" phone, not digital or SIP. Polycom does make a SIP phone like this, but the quality isn't the same. If you can get away with analog, go for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Doc1

customer_reviews.title: Easy Hook Up, Clear Sound
customer_reviews.text: At first I ordered wrong product. Return and refund was quick. Ordered this Analog conference room phone. Was very simple to hook up and use without directions. Definitely does the job for our conference room. Clear speaking voices with no interruptions. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James Gerrior

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Very good sound both ways
customer_reviews.text: Have used these in the past and I had high expectations for this unit. It lives up to the hype. Great phone. Very good sound both ways. I was concerned that it may not be loud enough, that is simply not the case. This phone is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. You will love it.
customer_reviews.text: Before this, we used a speakerphone. Once we used this, we don’t know why we went so long without it. Perfect for speakerphone meetings. It picks up the smallest sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless in Sagle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our conference room
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for our conference rooms and have really improved the quality of our calls.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, clear and loud.
customer_reviews.text: We have a few of these at my workplace, we recently expanded and ordered more because of how reliable, clear and loud they are. It works great for small office spaces or really large conference rooms.
customer_reviews.author: H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Power Supply is junk
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great. Power Supply or Polycom Sound Station2 Wall Module Part# 2201-16020-601 quit working witin 3 month. Now I have to buy a replacement for $100. It sounds like this is a common issue so factor the replacement part into your investment.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Mack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent conferencing phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent conference phone. It has many features beyond just conferencing, and overall provides excellent sound pickup, loud and wide ranging volume settings, and also supports hooking up to a PC.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent conference phone
customer_reviews.text: Really great phone with excellent quality. Plugs right into the phone line. Setup was super fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: jj15458

customer_reviews.title: I am returning the product as unusable.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot figure out how to set it up. The documentation is too small to read. The pictures in the documentation do not match what was actually sent to me. I am trying to figure out how to return it now. I wasted a day on this. I am disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J. Esposito

customer_reviews.title: This product is a joy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Polycom about two months ago. We use this product for business calls with 3 - 5 people on our side. I should have purchased this 5 years ago. If you still use a cell phone, get this product. Super clarity on our side and the feedback from our customers is the same. I did not purchase the external modules, no need at all for our small group. I played with cheaper products, with mixed results. This product is an absolute joy to use. You cannot believe the clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Wade H Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I used these at work and liked them...so I bought this for our church. easy to setup and easy to use. good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tgkfish

customer_reviews.title: but it works amazing. Definitely get extra mic pods as they make ...
customer_reviews.text: This is only for old school phone lines. Our office building just went to VOIP phone system so we now have to use cell phones in the speaker, but it works amazing. Definitely get extra mic pods as they make a huge difference
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Good system - good quality sound ans easy to use. I use this in multiple settings and am very mobile with it. One day i used it in 4 different locations in 4 diferent buildings. I use it with a Verizon Home telephone system and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tano

customer_reviews.title: Issues from the beginning
customer_reviews.text: Dials incorrect numbers often. Will input a number and it calls an unrelated number. Sometimes we have to input a number 2-3 times before it connects to the number dialed. Happens frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Sollie T.

customer_reviews.title: Polycom Quality as Expected!
customer_reviews.text: It's a Polycom speakerphone... There's a reason that no one uses any other brand. They are expensive because they are good products. Works fine, good volume and clarity. I chose this one because it's expandable with the remote mics later on.
customer_reviews.author: Tylan R.

customer_reviews.title: WHAT DO YOU EXPECT
customer_reviews.text: VOLUME CONTROL SET AT MAX AND NOT ABLE TO LOWER IT DOWN, HOWEVER WORKS WELL, OTHER THAN THAT.
customer_reviews.author: DONALD PRILL

customer_reviews.title: I paid for a new item, I received an used one.
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a brand new conference phone. The item wasn't damaged, but showed significant wear from use.
customer_reviews.author: ANDRES MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: The item shipped in a timely manner. However, ...
customer_reviews.text: The item shipped in a timely manner. However, when using the product during a conference call meeting there were complaints of audio difficulties. Overall, besides this deficiency the product seems to perform fairly well. Due to the audio problems there is a possibility our company may explore other options at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. We tested it and the sound quality was excellent. The range was very good even without adding additional microphones.
customer_reviews.author: DRestuc

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE SINGLE POTS LINE FOR THIS POLYCOM.
customer_reviews.text: Before buy please know you MUST have a single (POT Plain Old Telephone line) and it cannot be attached to a hunt group in order for this to work. I haven't had a chance to test out the quality of sound because i am waiting for a single phone line to be installed.
customer_reviews.author: Tae G.

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured!
customer_reviews.text: What was pictured was not what arrived.... specifically there was no LCD display. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Healy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in and used it right away upon receiving it. Clear sound and loud enough for everyone on both sides of the call to be understood. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Product didn't work right out of box
customer_reviews.text: The polycom powered up and we could hear the callers but the callers could hear us. Tried to process a return but no response. Whole experience sucked and wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Gaynor

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Ships on time & works well. Easy to assemble & simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Zerah

customer_reviews.title: It is not new one!
customer_reviews.text: I received a used product, with the power source broken, without box.
customer_reviews.author: Electroexport L.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds super!
customer_reviews.text: We previously had an older Polycom speaker phone that people on the other end of the line complained was too quiet. This new SoundStation2 sounds excellent. Very happy with the quality. I also like the fact that three little red lights turn on when the phone is on mute, so there's no wondering.
customer_reviews.author: jethrojimbob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent voice clarity
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these for my employer. I work in government for the engineering division. They liked this phone so much they had me order another one. We ordered the speakers with it and the clarity is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great phone...recommend adding speakers!
customer_reviews.text: It worked very well in a small conference room setting. We did get the 2 additional speakers, so I think that is definitely advisable. We received our order very quickly. It was packed well with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Polycom makes great products.
customer_reviews.text: It works very well with our office telephone system. Polycom makes great products.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Longboarder

customer_reviews.title: Solid Conference Phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent conference phone. Works great with our Avaya IP Office 500 V2 system. Very loud speaker and microphone has good range. While I got the one that has the ability to have expandable microphones we don't the extra microphones due to the great sound pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ropp

customer_reviews.title: Far Superior to Original SoundStation
customer_reviews.text: After frustrating our call-in board members for months with the first generation SoundStation, which couldn't pick up participants more than 3-4 feet away, we upgraded to this model. We can now hold meetings in a large room with the seven person board seated along three tables end wise, and the caller can hear all board members as well as questions from the audience. The difference was striking.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Foster

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Didn't need the extra mics for a conference table and 8 chatty board members. Good value, quick shipping.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Speakerphone for Home Office.
customer_reviews.text: Performs as expected. Most important, my clients and co-workers all say I sound clear on their end. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jack in Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for conference calls and meetings with people off-site.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality phone
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on this phone is great. So far we haven't had to add additional microphones, even though our conference room is fairly large. Quick delivery. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great Conference Phone with Separate Wireless Microphones
customer_reviews.text: This is the solution to larger conference calls where the folks on the other end cannot hear anything but a tunnel sound. I purchased the wireless microphones separately, not cheap, to work with them but the results are worth it
customer_reviews.author: Peter E. Safir

customer_reviews.title: Polycom SoundStation 2 Positive Feedback
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The sound quality is excellent and it is very user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing device. It worked right after connecting the power and voice cables to the wall. No further setup was needed. The microphones catch human voice from every corner or our conference room. Also, the password protected administrative menu is a plus. Managing the phone book is pretty easy, as soon as you get familiar with menu navigation keys. The only thing I'd wish is that it could be able to be used with a PBX direct connection, but unfortunately it only works with an analog telephone line. I definitely recommend this unit to those that have an analog line dedicated to their conference room.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Device stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The device stopped working about 8 months of use. This device is too expensive to fail so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hudmon

customer_reviews.title: No Call History.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great, except that it does not have a call history. How can a phone not have call history?
customer_reviews.author: Manne

customer_reviews.title: The only choice when it comes to a speaker phone
customer_reviews.text: How is it possible that Polycom still is the only company to make perfect sounding speaker phones? Everything else I try sounds terrible compared to Polycoms. The only time I've had it not sound flawless is when in a small room with a big echo problem due to a lot of hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase and well worth the money! We are a small business but this makes us very professional. If you ever have to conduct conference calls this is the product you need. Sound quality is exceptional from both sides. You can conference in a third party from this phone during a call. My only gripe is the phonebook displays are not very custommizable, but not a deal breaker in any way.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Best Inexpensive Conference Phone
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying a second Polycom phone after having major audio issues while making conference calls at my work in South San Francisco. They have a great customer support team as well in case you have any issues with your phone. Additionally, if you have more than 5 people on the conference line, you should consider buying. We use this extension kit to make company calls with a table of 10 employees and the sound quality is excellent. Thanks Polycom!!
customer_reviews.author: Stevil

customer_reviews.title: Polycom SS2 works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: We purchased product for board meetings involving 15 persons, several of whom call in from remote locations. The sound quality on receiving in the room was excellent, and the volume was as loud as we needed. Apparently the microphones were also excellent, because those calling in had no difficulty hearing comments from any part of the room.
customer_reviews.author: W. Stimpson

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is really good. You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for work. Sound quality is really good. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Hurricane Harvey Recovery Helper
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for our temporary office after Hurricane Harvey! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: there are not enough stars to rate this produce.,,
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a speaker phone that matches the quality of this product. I totally recommend it to anyone who can benefit from hands free, quality sound and convenience.
customer_reviews.author: william c. routh

customer_reviews.title: Above and beyond
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in excellent condition. It is perceived to be able to provide the desired results per research and other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: We returned the first one which did not power up and now the replacement has died a few months later and was hardly used. I reached out to the company by email but have received no reply. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: mike in mn

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I wish they would continue to make this model. It gives me everything I need and also allows me to amplify the signal for a large group without having to use a telephone interface unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: used a few times
customer_reviews.text: This equipment works well for conference call meetings. It works even better when the folks in the meeting only talk one atg a time. Sigh, too much to ask for in one of my condo associations
customer_reviews.author: Austin Buckeye

customer_reviews.title: Good company
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with power supply upon arrival. Called Polycom and, after a little troubleshooting, they immediately sent another at no charge. These guys are great!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great phone system...
customer_reviews.text: However, this does not have the wireless phone/battery features of similar models, e.g. for placing in the middle of a conference table people can walk around.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Bennett

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: liked the product, easy to use. this product was used for conference calls.
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA K. MCKENZIE

customer_reviews.title: This product accommodates all our needs. We currently have ...
customer_reviews.text: This product accommodates all our needs. We currently have two of this product and needed to add an additional one. Have had no problems
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: perfection
customer_reviews.text: superb quality! does not work with digital phone systems but still worth every darn penny!
customer_reviews.author: Buckaroobanzai55

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job we want it too and is nice and heavy so it doesn't slide.
customer_reviews.author: tvlover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to be able to actually hear people speak with this conference phone. At even 10' away!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize it was analog until after it got here.
customer_reviews.author: Karl J. Forehand

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. works great! One of the best purchases we've ever made. Use it often!
customer_reviews.author: Bcs

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for our condominium association board meetings, so out of town members could participate. Everyone is very happy with it. It is very easy to set up and the sound quality is very good. We are going to purchase the extension microphones to pick up questions from the audience better.
customer_reviews.author: mabl

customer_reviews.title: Sound is fantastic! Better than other Polycoms I ordered earlier
customer_reviews.text: Sound is fantastic! Better than other Polycoms I ordered earlier. Be sure it's this SoundStation2, and order the 2EX microphone pods that help extend this set up.
customer_reviews.author: frinkydinky

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best. (Although I had to return the first one ...
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best. (Although I had to return the first one as it gave an echo.)
customer_reviews.author: R. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, packaged very well and secure. Easy to set up and use. Great choice for the very load office.
customer_reviews.author: Randal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and sound is very clear. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: JFD

customer_reviews.title: Very Sad
customer_reviews.text: Getting the product quickly was great. But the product arrived defective. Not able to make out going calls at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with cable based Polycom phone system. ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with cable based Polycom phone system. Only works with analog based Polycom phone system. Mobile log in as an echo and can not use on conference calls.
customer_reviews.author: Yes!

customer_reviews.title: Trouble with conference lag? Two people try to talk? This set is your solution!
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone in my corporate office and the sound was always clear and loud. I decided to purchase one for use in board meetings here in our community. As before no surprise here either, this is solid performer which supersedes many competitors. The special DSP feature make conversation lag free unlike many other sets out there making remote business meetings successful and stress free ensuring no two people try to talk at the same time. Great product, always recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for teleconferencing. Sound quality is good and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joycelyn A. Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this one is the one that worked and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Garcia

customer_reviews.title: As soon as we had this phone all set up ...
customer_reviews.text: As soon as we had this phone all set up and ready to use, it died. Only worked for about a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The Polycom i ordered did work i had to send it back and pay all the shipment cost
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: Defective phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone was easy to set up and has barely been touched since we received it 3 months ago. It works sometimes and then decides to not work, with no dial tone and the lights on the console light up as red. We could not return it, as the issue started after our 30 day return policy. There has been no assistance from the manufacturer. We will purchase direct from a licensed Polycom dealer going forward. This was a terrible experience with a phone that we anticipated to be one of the best and should clearly be under warranty, as it is a new product. A regular, cheap phone is more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does the job. The microphones are not as ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. The microphones are not as sensitive as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Philly Frog

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great easy to install. Much better than the standard phone that we were using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Polycom SoundStation2 arrived on time and works great! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: it's easy to use and it beats the old the speaker ...
customer_reviews.text: It works really well. The sound is very clear, it's easy to use and it beats the old the speaker phone system 10 to 1.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Polycom Soundstation2 expanded
customer_reviews.text: The Polycom Soundstaton 2 with two extra mics allows audio conferencing that is user-friendly, quick to set-up and an efficient tool. I would estimate that between several departments, we use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Lovedog

customer_reviews.title: Great Conference Phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone after researching several conference room phones. The Polycom SoundStation2 Expandable was the perfect phone for our conference room. One of our guys wears a hearing aid and there is no feedback from it or any of our cell phones!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I used it in a fairly large room without any microphone extensions. The parties on the other end seemed to have heard everybody in the room well. Easy to use and connect to the computer. Note that this product includes the computer kit. So, no need to buy a cable separately.
customer_reviews.author: Gurkhahere

customer_reviews.title: Polycom Audio conference devices
customer_reviews.text: Polycom devices are very dependable. We have a mixture of different manufacturer devices in our compnay. The Polycom are the most dependable. Others have features that are nice and can be less expensive but for the long haul, the Polycom devices stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: RG Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and set up. Excellent sound quality. No wonder it is the most popular conference phone out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Wages

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It has worked exactly as described and has done what we needed. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with power adapter
customer_reviews.text: The power supply is not 110-240. I end up frying the adapter. Anyway, the sound quality is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Aung M.

customer_reviews.title: Polycom conference phone
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this phone to replace a much older (10+ years!) phone that worked so poorly, conference calls were a burden and a challenge. Voices were distorted and sound quality was uneven (voices would drop off in mid-word and then be audible for several seconds, and drop off again). We purchased the phone with the satellite mikes, because we often have a group of 10-15 people in one room communicating with 8 to 10 people at other locations. The mikes and the phone work *really* well - just as other folks' reviews said they would. Delivery was exceptionally fast, and the phone and mikes were well-packaged, too. I recommend the product and the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Kwill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my midsize conference room. Sound quality very good and setup was easy. Happy with this purchase for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Durscher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, quality and performance good. arrived on time as promised.
customer_reviews.author: IT ADMIN

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Met or exceeded all my expectations. The product came quickly, was in great shape and sanam-sama responded quickly to my questions. Overall it was a great experience and I will definitely use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy

customer_reviews.title: Sound is clear. Met my expectations. Needs a ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is clear. Met my expectations. Needs a special outlet to plug on to.
customer_reviews.author: Jayam Trouth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great everything love this product would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Zaugg

product_meta.title: Polycom SoundStation2 Expandable Conference Phone (2200-16200-001)
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Remarkable voice quality. The new standard for everyday conferencing. The SoundStation2, Polycom's next generation conference phone, is redefining the standard for business-quality voice conferencing. With industry-leading full duplex for natural, simultaneous two-way conversation, the SoundStation2 will exceed your expectations in medium to small conference rooms. Delivering remarkable voice quality equal to the SoundStation Premier and a 50% increase in microphone sensitivity over the award-winning SoundStation, users can speak in a normal voice and be heard clearly up to ten feet away -- making every call a more productive call.

 SoundStation2 provides users with features, including a large backlit display that offers easily visible call information and telephone functions. Smart technology, such as Dynamic Noise Reduction (DNR), provides maximum microphone sensitivity, while reducing distracting room and background noise. And the SoundStation2 offers 360-degree microphone coverage with intelligent mixing -- so only the microphone closest to the speaker is on for crystal clear conferencing. Add traditional telephone features like redial, mute, transfer, and hold and you have a conference phone that's also familiar and easy to use.

 Improve the quality and increase the productivity of your next conference call with the Polycom SoundStation2. It's the conference phone you won't stop talking about!

 The new standard for everyday conferencing to access the power of Polycom unified collaborative communications solutions. With the greatest breadth and depth of integrated video, voice, and Web solutions, only Polycom delivers the ultimate communications experience. Our market-leading conferencing and collaboration technologies, supported by world-class service, enable people and organizations to maximize their effectiveness and productivity. Add to that the most experience and proven best-practices in the industry, and it's clear why Polycom has become the smart choice for organizations seeking a strategic advantage in a real-time world.

 Benefits: 

 * More productive calls Ð Polycom's patented Acoustic Clarity Technology allows simultaneous, natural, free-flowing conversation 
 * Hear and be heard clearly Ð Twice the loudness and microphone sensitivity of the original SoundStation -- eliminates ear strain and repetition 
 * Backlit display provides important information Ð Displays console phone number, number called, duration/progress of call and supports worldwide Caller ID 
 * Ability to increase coverage Ð Optional extension microphones expand coverage for larger conference rooms 
 * Easy to use and install Ð Connects into any analog phone jack and can be connected to a PBX with an analog extension 

 Features: 

 * Polycom acoustic clarity full duplex 
 * 3 cardiod microphones 
 * 10 foot microphone pickup range 
 * Intelligent microphone mixing 
 * Dynamic Noise Reduction 
 * Volume (adjustable up to 94 dBA at 0.5 meters) 
 * User selectable ring tones 
 * 12-key telephone keypad 
 * Mute, volume up/down keys 
 * Mute, conference keys 
 * Graphical backlit LCD 
 * Configurable conference speed dial key 
 * 3 context sensitive soft-keys 
 * Multi-lingual user interface 
 * Caller ID 
 * 25 entry phone book 
 * RCA auxiliary audio jack 
 * Applications port 
 * EX microphone jacks 

 What's in the Box
SoundStation2 tabletop phone console, 21-foot cord to console, 7-foot telco cable to RJ-11 telephone jack, user documentation (user guide CD, quick installation guide, registration card)
